event: User radio check with one another person (one another)
description: {TPO_NAME} conducts Radio Check with his Partner, {PARTNER_NAME} using Group Call. ({TPO_NAME} selects the appropriate Group Channel, press the PTT button …..)

{PARTNER_NAME}, send, over.
{TPO_NAME}, Radio Check, over.
{PARTNER_NAME}, Radio Check OK, over.

event: User request for Track Access from TC
description: {TPO_NAME} calls {CONTROL_CENTER} to request for Track Access using Individual Calls ( {CONTROL_CENTER} responded on {CONTROL_CENTER}); and in this case request is denied, as OCS is still live.

conversation.utterance: {CONTROL_CENTER}, Send, over
{TPO_NAME}, Can I access the tracks, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, Negative. OCS is still live, over
{TPO_NAME}, Wilco, out
You have done responded to the SOP correctly. You have reached the end of the conversation

event: User request for Access to Depot Wash Plant Track.
description: {TPO_NAME} calls {DEPOT_CONTROL} to request for Track Access  ( {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {DEPOT_CONTROL}....)

conversation.utterance: {DEPOT_CONTROL}, Send, over
{TPO_NAME}, request access to Daily Wash Track, over
{DEPOT_CONTROL}, Negative. There is a train at that track. Do not access. Read Back Message, over
{TPO_NAME}, I Read Back your Message, there is a train at the Daily Wash track. I am not allowed to access, over
{DEPOT_CONTROL}, correct, over
{TPO_NAME}, Roger, out
You have done responded to the SOP correctly. You have reached the end of the conversation

description: {CONTROL_CENTER} calls {TPO_NAME} to issue TOA Number. ( {CONTROL_CENTER} activates the TETRA radio number of {TPO_NAME}....)

conversation.utterance: {TPO_NAME}, is TOA ready?send, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, are you ready for your TOA, over
{TPO_NAME}, I am ready for my TOA, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, your TOA number is {TOA_NUMBER}, over
{TPO_NAME}, my TOA number is {TOA_NUMBER}, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, that is correct. TOA issued time is {TIME}. Call Back time is {TIME} hrs over
{TPO_NAME}, I read back, TOA issued time is {TIME}. And Call Back time is {TIME}, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, positive, you may proceed with your work, over
{TPO_NAME}, Roger out
You have done responded to the SOP correctly. You have reached the end of the conversation

event: TPO calls TC to surrender his TOA.
description: {TPO_NAME} calls {CONTROL_CENTER} to surrender his TOA after completion of work. (Non Traffic Hours Track Access and {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)

conversation.utterance: {CONTROL_CENTER}, Send, over
{TPO_NAME}, I have completed my work and want to surrender my TOA, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, please proceed with your Line Clear message, over
{TPO_NAME}, All staff, material and equipment are off the track and tunnel and it is safe for train to run. I surrender my TOA {TOA_NUMBER}, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, Line Clear Message Acknowledged, TOA {TOA_NUMBER} surrendered at {TIME}, over
{TPO_NAME}, TOA surrendered at {TIME}, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, that is correct, out
You have done responded to the SOP correctly. You have reached the end of the conversation

event: Radio calls to TC to report fault.

{STATION} {SM}, South Bound Platform PSD number {PSD_NUMBER} is observed closing very slowly, over

event: Signal Technician calls TC to Confirm Point Position on GWS signalling system.
description: Signal Technician, {TPO_NAME}, calls {CONTROL_CENTER} to confirm Point Machine Detection on GWS after Point Machine repair. ( {TPO_NAME} activates the TETRA radio number of {CONTROL_CENTER}…....)

conversation.utterance: {CONTROL_CENTER}, send over.
{TPO_NAME}, please confirm the position of Point {POINT_NUMBER} on your GWS over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, Point {POINT_NUMBER} is at Normal position on my GWS. over
{TPO_NAME}, Point {POINT_NUMBER} is at Reverse position on your GWS over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, Negative. I Say Again. Point {POINT_NUMBER} is at Normal position on my GWS over
{TPO_NAME}, Point {POINT_NUMBER} is at Normal position on your GWS over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, that is correct, over
{TPO_NAME}, I request to set Point {POINT_NUMBER} to Manual Mode, over
{CONTROL_CENTER}, you are authorised to set Point {POINT_NUMBER} to Manual mode, over
{TPO_NAME}, Point {POINT_NUMBER} set to Manual Mode now. Nothing further, out
You have done responded to the SOP correctly. You have reached the end of the conversation

event: TC talk to CSO to impose 20 kph for Tunnel Walkway Procedure
description: Traffic Controller ({CONTROL_CENTER}) imposed 20 kph for tunnel walkway procedure, call {CSO_NAME} ({TRAIN_CAR}) to verify Target Speed. {CONTROL_CENTER} key in {TRAIN_CAR} Tetra Radio ID and depress PTT, {CSO_NAME} Tetra radio alert sounded ….

event: TPO requesting for point detection test

{TPO_NAME}, roger, all personnel are standing clear away from point, over.

{TPO_NAME}, point {POINT_NUMBER} now at Normal position, over.

{TPO_NAME}, point {POINT_NUMBER} now at Reverse position, over.

{TPO_NAME}, point {POINT_NUMBER} now at Normal position, over.
